cards.notes:
During each of your turns, as long as there are four or more card types among permanents you control, you may cast one permanent spell with mana value 3 or less from your graveyard. If you cast a spell this way, that permanent enters with a finality counter on it. (If a permanent with a finality counter on it would die, exile it instead.)
